meanings.definition: Relating to or denoting the most recent era of geological time, covering the period from the end of the Mesozoic era to the present.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the cenozoic rocks to understand the Earth's recent history.
meanings.sent2: The cenozoic climate was different from that of the Mesozoic era.
meanings.sent3: The museum displayed a cenozoic exhibit with fossils and artifacts.
meanings.sent4: Her knowledge of cenozoic events was as deep as the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used colorful diagrams to explain the cenozoic era to the students.

meanings.sent1: Many species evolved during the cenozoic, adapting to changing environments.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study fossils to learn more about life in the cenozoic.
meanings.sent3: The children pretended to be cenozoic creatures during playtime.
meanings.sent4: Exploring the cenozoic era is like uncovering a treasure trove of history.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the cenozoic era is captured in the intricate details of ancient plants.
